snippet: The Leafs have slid down the standings, and passionate fans in Toronto have little patience with a franchise that has not won a Stanley Cup since 1967.
abstract: Toronto Maple Leafs will rely on backup goaltender James Reimer, who has been derided by some fans, as they pursue dwindling playoff hopes; fans are frustrated with team that has not won a Stanley Cup since 1967.
lead_paragraph: The Leafs have slid down the standings, and passionate fans in Toronto have little patience with a franchise that has not won a Stanley Cup since 1967.

headline.main: As Critics Vent, Maple Leafs Take Deep Breaths
headline.print_headline: As Critics Vent, Leafs Take Deep Breaths
